column4: Im installing ubuntu 7.02... I have windows already installed and I want to install ubuntu in the free space... when creating the new partition for ubuntu   do I have to create it as ext3? logical or primary?

Im installing ubuntu 7.02... I have windows already installed and I want to install ubuntu in the free space... when creating the new partition for ubuntu   do I have to create it as ext3? logical or primary?
there's an option in the installer to just use the free space on your drive, it should automatically decide those things
